mapper.select: select exam_kind as examKind, exam_num as examNum, exam_question as examQuestion, exam_division as examDivision, exam_choice1 as examChoice1, exam_choice2 as examChoice2, exam_choice3 as examChoice3, exam_choice4 as examChoice4, exam_choice5 as examChoice5, exam_answer as examAnswer, exam_content as examContent from exam where exam_id = 1
